originalText.text: Dr. Tarwala performed my hip replacement surgery. He truly epitomizes all you want in a doctor - compassionate, empathetic, trustworthy, a great listener, he explained my test results in layman terms, walked me through the surgery multiple times to calm my nerves and has been my cheerleader all the way. Just shy of my 5 month anniversary, I excitedly began the Return to Running program. He's an extraordinary doctor.

originalText.text:
Dr. Tarwala is an amazing doctor, and an excellent surgeon! He was so caring during my time of need.
He ensure that my surgery was a total success!
Many thanks,…thank you again!
Kind regards,
Zulma Kopstein

originalText.text: Dr. Rupesh is absolutely amazing, has the best bedside manners and makes you feel very comfortable. He is the best orthopedic doctor i have ever seen. If you have lost hopes or are clueless about your condition ( anything related to bones and joints), then please go see him. I never leave any reviews online but i really wanted to, to help others. I hope this review helps others looking for a good orthopedic doctor.

originalText.text: I had a total knee replacement with Dr Tarwala a few weeks ago in Jan 2023. I am so happy I have been going to New York Bone & Joint for my orthopedic issues. Dr Tarwala performed this surgery and I cannot say enough good things about him, his staff and his expert care of me. His knowledge of the knee and leg is just amazing as well as his explanation of the process and the recovery process has really helped put me at ease from day one.  I highly recommend him and his team at New York Bone and Joint if you are having knee, hip or any orthopedic problems. Also let me say I really love "All sports Therapy" where I am having outpatient PT. They have helped me in gaining mobility in my recovery! They are so very nice also! The staff at Dr Tarwala's office and staff and therapists with PT are not only top notch but just really outstanding in helping patients through this surgery and are so kind and just the best. So happy I went with Dr Tarwala and NYBJ and All Sports !

originalText.text: Dr. Tarwala made me feel confident in my decision to move forward with surgery. He is detailed, compassionate, involved, and takes time to explain all options. Truly you will feel very taken care of. I am 28 years old and a month out from hip surgery. Dr. Tarwala called me the day before surgery as well as the night of my surgery to check in on me. I feel like I got my life back and it is because of him and his team...I am deeply appreciative.. YES you will have to wait to see him, because again he takes his time. The wait is worth it. Bring work or a book and be patient. :)
